Privacy Policy

Last updated: December 18, 2025

At CleanBoard, we take your privacy seriously. This policy explains how we handle your dataâ€”or more accurately, why we don't handle it at all.

1. No Data Collection

CleanBoard is designed to be a completely offline keyboard. We do not collect, store, or transmit any of your personal data, keystrokes, or typing history. Everything you type remains on your device and is never sent to any external server.

2. No Internet Permission

The CleanBoard app does not require and does not use the Android "Internet" permission. This means the app is technically incapable of sending any information from your device to the internet.

3. Permissions Usage

CleanBoard may request the following permissions only for essential functionality:

  • Vibration: To provide haptic feedback when you press a key (if enabled).

4. Third-Party Services

CleanBoard does not use any third-party analytics, tracking, or advertising SDKs. There is no hidden code that monitors your usage.

5. Policy Updates

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last updated" date.

6. Contact

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us at: privacy@heymeowcat.is-a.dev
